context_bundle.summary: Crypto market fundamentals: BTC halving cycles (2012/2016/2020/2024), bull/bear phases, macro drivers (Fed rates, DXY, liquidity), market cap dominance, Fear & Greed Index interpretation.

onboarding.quick_start: Bull markets: 12-18mo post-halving. Bear markets: 12-18mo after blow-off top. Watch Fed policy, DXY strength, global liquidity. Fear & Greed <20 = accumulation zone, >80 = distribution.
common_patterns: Halving cycle: Supply shock → 12-18mo rally → blow-off top → 80% drawdown → accumulation
Macro correlation: Risk-on (rate cuts, QE) = BTC up. Risk-off (rate hikes, QT) = BTC down
Dominance cycle: BTC dominance rises early bull, falls late bull as alts pump
Whale watching: Large wallet movements signal distribution/accumulation phases
known_errors: Assuming past cycles repeat exactly - each has unique characteristics
Ignoring macro - crypto doesn't exist in vacuum, Fed policy matters
FOMO buying at ATH during euphoria phase
Panic selling during capitulation - often the bottom
